xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/331220-Daddy Has Gone and Left Me Puzzled 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null In this personal film, director Marijn Frank tries to find out who her dying father is through conversations with his loved ones. From these confrontational meetings, a painful picture emerges of a family burdened by the war and a history that keeps repeating itself. Daddy Has Gone and Left Me Puzzled
